about_the_game:
John Herrin survived a horrible accident, damaging his brain and memory. Through falling asleep, he can rediscover his unfortunate past in his dreams, but because of his brain damage he'll start to see visions and hallucinations, and falling asleep won't be as easy as it seems at first...

The BETA


The Beta represents the general idea/concept of what the game is about and how it works, but it's not the final product yet. We look forward to seeing people's reactions as well as listen to feedback from the community. Based on this feedback, we will try to improve the game as much as we can. Presumably, the Beta is about 1/6th of the full version of the game. We have developed more content that is not available in the Beta, but will be integrated in the full version of the game. Stay tuned for future developments!
